hero.name: Simon Erik Nyblom
hero.title: Frontend Developer with a passion for general development
hero.description: Building digital experiences with modern web technologies. Focused on clean code, performance, and user experience.

about.title: About
about.content: I'm a developer passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems. With expertise in React, TypeScript, and Node.js, I build scalable applications that users love. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies or contributing to open source.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
